Bodhi Timer is an elegant, minimalist countdown timer, designed mainly for use as a meditation timer, but it can easily be used for any similar purpose.

Set the time via the clock icon in the top left, pause/resume via the buttons in the bottom left, and stop the timer via the button in the bottom right. The top right button is the preference button.

Clicking on the Bodhi leaf changes to one of four circle animations, which can be chosen from the preferences screen.
